sect2.title: Known bugs
sect2.para: Known bugs are available on Bugzilla summary page.
If you find some new bug in &prodname;, you are welcome to open it by pointing your favorite browser to Bugzilla web site.

sect2.title: Known limitations

formalpara.title: Execution mode
formalpara.para: As of version 3.0, execution mode may be configured in &appname; but is not yet honored by &caja; plugin.

sect2.para: This concern working directory, execution mode, startup notification and execution's owner parameters.

formalpara.title: Suggested shortcut
formalpara.para: As of version 3.0, suggested shortcut, as described in DES-EMA specification, cannot be configured in &appname;, and is not honored by &caja; plugin.

formalpara.title: Menu separator
formalpara.para: As of version 3.0, menu separators cannot be configured in &appname;, and are not honored by &caja; plugin.

sect2.para: One has to note that, for now, &caja; file manager does not allow its plugins to define separators in the context menu.
